originContent: # Enhanced PubChem MCP Server for AI Assistants
translatedContent: # Serveur PubChem MCP Am√©lior√© pour Assistants IA

originContent: üß™ An advanced, robust, and privacy-focused MCP server that enables AI assistants to intelligently search and access chemical compound information from PubChem.
translatedContent: üß™ Un serveur MCP avanc√©, robuste et ax√© sur la confidentialit√© qui permet aux assistants IA de rechercher et d‚Äôacc√©der intelligemment aux informations sur les compos√©s chimiques depuis PubChem.

originContent: This PubChem MCP Server acts as a powerful bridge between AI assistants (like those in AnythingLLM) and PubChem's vast chemical database. It leverages the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to allow AI models to perform smart, resilient searches for chemical compounds and retrieve their detailed properties programmatically.
translatedContent: Ce serveur PubChem MCP agit comme un puissant pont entre les assistants IA (comme ceux d‚ÄôAnythingLLM) et l‚Äôimmense base de donn√©es chimiques de PubChem. Il exploite le Model Context Protocol (MCP) pour permettre aux mod√®les IA d‚Äôeffectuer des recherches intelligentes et r√©silientes de compos√©s chimiques et de r√©cup√©rer leurs propri√©t√©s d√©taill√©es de mani√®re programmatique.

originContent: ## ‚ú® Core Features
translatedContent: ## ‚ú® Fonctionnalit√©s Cl√©s

originContent: This is not just another PubChem wrapper. This server has been rebuilt from the ground up to be highly robust and intelligent:
translatedContent: Ce n‚Äôest pas un simple wrapper PubChem. Ce serveur a √©t√© reconstruit de z√©ro pour √™tre tr√®s robuste et intelligent :

originContent: -   **üß† Smart Fallback Search**: If a search for a common name (like "Vitamin D") fails, the server automatically performs a deeper search in the PubChem Substance database to find the correct compound. This dramatically improves success rates for ambiguous queries.
translatedContent: -   **üß† Recherche de Secours Intelligente** : Si une recherche par nom commun (comme ¬´ Vitamine D ¬ª) √©choue, le serveur effectue automatiquement une recherche approfondie dans la base de donn√©es Substance de PubChem pour trouver le compos√© correct. Cela am√©liore consid√©rablement les taux de r√©ussite pour les requ√™tes ambigu√´s.

originContent: -   **üõ°Ô∏è Robust Error Handling & Retries**: The server is designed to handle API errors gracefully. If it encounters a "Server Busy" error from PubChem, it will automatically wait and retry the request, ensuring your queries succeed even under heavy load.
translatedContent: -   **üõ°Ô∏è Gestion Robuste des Erreurs & Reprises Automatiques** : Le serveur est con√ßu pour g√©rer √©l√©gamment les erreurs API. S‚Äôil rencontre une erreur ¬´ Serveur Occup√© ¬ª de PubChem, il attendra automatiquement puis r√©essaiera la requ√™te, garantissant le succ√®s de vos requ√™tes m√™me sous forte charge.

originContent: -   **üîí Optional Tor Proxy Support**: You have full control over your privacy. A simple `config.ini` file allows you to route all requests through the Tor network (via SOCKS5 or HTTP proxy), preventing your IP address from being exposed. The server is secure by default and will **never** leak your IP if the proxy connection fails.
translatedContent: -   **üîí Support Optionnel de Proxy Tor** : Vous avez un contr√¥le total sur votre confidentialit√©. Un simple fichier `config.ini` vous permet de router toutes les requ√™tes via le r√©seau Tor (via proxy SOCKS5 ou HTTP), emp√™chant l‚Äôexposition de votre adresse IP. Le serveur est s√©curis√© par d√©faut et ne **fuitera jamais** votre IP si la connexion proxy √©choue.

originContent: -   **üîé Single & Multiple Compound Search**: Seamlessly handles requests for one or multiple compounds in a single prompt.
translatedContent: -   **üîé Recherche de Compos√© Unique & Multiple** : G√®re sans difficult√© les requ√™tes pour un ou plusieurs compos√©s dans un seul prompt.

originContent: -   **üß™ Detailed Property Retrieval**: Access key chemical properties like IUPAC Name, Molecular Formula, Molecular Weight, and crucially, **Monoisotopic Mass**.
translatedContent: -   **üß™ R√©cup√©ration D√©tail√©e des Propri√©t√©s** : Acc√®s aux propri√©t√©s chimiques cl√©s comme le nom IUPAC, la formule mol√©culaire, le poids mol√©culaire, et surtout, la **masse monoisotopique**.

originContent: ### üöÄ No Installation Required: Try It Live on Smithery.ai
translatedContent: ### üöÄ Aucune Installation Requise : Essayez-le en Direct sur Smithery.ai

originContent: For those who are new to MCP servers or just want to test the capabilities of this tool without any local setup, a live, hosted version is available on Smithery.ai. This allows you to chat with the agent directly in your browser.
translatedContent: Pour ceux qui d√©couvrent les serveurs MCP ou qui souhaitent simplement tester les capacit√©s de cet outil sans installation locale, une version h√©berg√©e en direct est disponible sur Smithery.ai. Cela vous permet de discuter avec l‚Äôagent directement depuis votre navigateur.

originContent: [**<-- Explore the Live PubChem Agent on Smithery.ai -->**](https://smithery.ai/server/@Milor123/smithery-pubchem-deploy)
translatedContent: [**<-- Explorez l‚ÄôAgent PubChem en Direct sur Smithery.ai -->**](https://smithery.ai/server/@Milor123/smithery-pubchem-deploy)

originContent: **How to get started:**
translatedContent: **Comment d√©marrer :**

originContent: 1.  Click the link above to go to the server page.
translatedContent: 1.  Cliquez sur le lien ci-dessus pour acc√©der √† la page du serveur.

originContent: 2.  Sign in using your **GitHub** or **Google** account.
translatedContent: 2.  Connectez-vous avec votre compte **GitHub** ou **Google**.

originContent: 3.  Click the **"Explore capabilities"** button to open a chat interface and start testing!
translatedContent: 3.  Cliquez sur le bouton **¬´ Explorer les capacit√©s ¬ª** pour ouvrir une interface de chat et commencer les tests !

originContent: > **‚úÖ Recommended Models for Best Results**
translatedContent: > **‚úÖ Mod√®les Recommand√©s pour de Meilleurs R√©sultats**

originContent: > To get the highest accuracy, especially with long decimal numbers, we strongly recommend using powerful models. The following have been tested and work excellently with this tool:
translatedContent: > Pour obtenir la plus grande pr√©cision, notamment avec les nombres d√©cimaux longs, nous recommandons fortement d‚Äôutiliser des mod√®les puissants. Les suivants ont √©t√© test√©s et fonctionnent parfaitement avec cet outil :

originContent: > *   **Anthropic's Claude 3 Sonnet**
translatedContent: > *   **Claude 3 Sonnet d‚ÄôAnthropic**

originContent: > *   **OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo** (or newer versions like GPT-4o)
translatedContent: > *   **GPT-4 Turbo d‚ÄôOpenAI** (ou versions plus r√©centes comme GPT-4o)

originContent: > We confirmed that both models correctly processed the full precision of the decimal numbers returned by the tool without any rounding.
translatedContent: > Nous avons confirm√© que les deux mod√®les ont correctement trait√© la pleine pr√©cision des nombres d√©cimaux renvoy√©s par l'outil sans aucun arrondi.

originContent: ## üöÄ Quick Start & Installation
translatedContent: ## üöÄ D√©marrage rapide & Installation

originContent: This server is designed to be run locally, either on your desktop or within the AnythingLLM Docker environment.
translatedContent: Ce serveur est con√ßu pour √™tre ex√©cut√© localement, soit sur votre bureau soit dans l'environnement Docker AnythingLLM.

originContent: ### 1. Dependencies
translatedContent: ### 1. D√©pendances

originContent: This project relies on a few Python libraries. Make sure they are installed in your environment.
translatedContent: Ce projet repose sur quelques biblioth√®ques Python. Assurez-vous qu'elles sont install√©es dans votre environnement.

originContent: Create a `requirements.txt` file with the following content:
translatedContent: Cr√©ez un fichier `requirements.txt` avec le contenu suivant :

originContent: ```txt
translatedContent: ```txt

originContent: requests
translatedContent: requests

originContent: bs4
translatedContent: bs4

originContent: mcp
translatedContent: mcp

originContent: pubchempy
translatedContent: pubchempy

originContent: pandas
translatedContent: pandas

originContent: PySocks
translatedContent: PySocks

originContent: Install them using `uv` or `pip`:
translatedContent: Installez-les en utilisant `uv` ou `pip` :

originContent: ```bash
translatedContent: ```bash

originContent: uv venv
translatedContent: uv venv

originContent: .venv\Scripts\activate
translatedContent: .venv\Scripts\activate

originContent: uv pip install -r requirements.txt
translatedContent: uv pip install -r requirements.txt

originContent: *(Note: `PySocks` is only required if you plan to use the Tor SOCKS5 proxy feature.)*
translatedContent: *(Remarque : `PySocks` est uniquement requis si vous pr√©voyez d'utiliser la fonctionnalit√© de proxy SOCKS5 de Tor.)*

originContent: ### 2. Configuration
translatedContent: ### 2. Configuration

originContent: The server is configured via a `config.ini` file that is **automatically created** the first time you run it. This file will appear in the same directory as the `pubchem_server.py` script.
translatedContent: Le serveur est configur√© via un fichier `config.ini` qui est **cr√©√© automatiquement** lors de la premi√®re ex√©cution. Ce fichier appara√Ætra dans le m√™me r√©pertoire que le script `pubchem_server.py`.

originContent: **Default `config.ini`:**
translatedContent: **`config.ini` par d√©faut :**

originContent: ```ini
translatedContent: ```ini

originContent: [proxy]
translatedContent: [proxy]

originContent: # Change 'use_proxy' to 'true' to route all requests through a proxy.
translatedContent: # Change 'use_proxy' to 'true' to route all requests through a proxy.

originContent: # Essential for protecting your privacy if you use Tor.
translatedContent: # Essential for protecting your privacy if you use Tor.

originContent: use_proxy = false
translatedContent: use_proxy = false

originContent: # Defines the proxy type. Options:
translatedContent: # Defines the proxy type. Options:

originContent: #   socks5h  -> (Recommended for Tor) The native SOCKS proxy for Tor. More secure.
translatedContent: #   socks5h  -> (Recommended for Tor) The native SOCKS proxy for Tor. More secure.

originContent: #   http     -> An HTTP proxy. If using Tor, requires additional configuration.
translatedContent: #   http     -> An HTTP proxy. If using Tor, requires additional configuration.

originContent: proxy_type = socks5h
translatedContent: proxy_type = socks5h

originContent: # The proxy address. THIS IS A CRITICAL SETTING!
translatedContent: # The proxy address. THIS IS A CRITICAL SETTING!

originContent: #   - If you run this script on your DESKTOP, use: 127.0.0.1
translatedContent: #   - If you run this script on your DESKTOP, use: 127.0.0.1

originContent: #   - If you run this script inside DOCKER, use: host.docker.internal
translatedContent: #   - If you run this script inside DOCKER, use: host.docker.internal

originContent: # The proxy port.
translatedContent: # The proxy port.

originContent: #   9050 -> Default port for Tor's SOCKS proxy.
translatedContent: #   9050 -> Default port for Tor's SOCKS proxy.

originContent: #   8118 -> Default port for Tor's HTTP proxy (if enabled).
translatedContent: #   8118 -> Default port for Tor's HTTP proxy (if enabled).

originContent: port = 9050
translatedContent: port = 9050

originContent: ### 3. Integration with AnythingLLM
translatedContent: ### 3. Int√©gration avec AnythingLLM

originContent: Follow the official documentation to add this as a custom MCP server. The key is to point the `command` to your Python executable and the `pubchem_server.py` script.
translatedContent: Suivez la documentation officielle pour ajouter ceci en tant que serveur MCP personnalis√©. L'important est de pointer la `command` vers votre ex√©cutable Python et le script `pubchem_server.py`.

originContent: **Example for AnythingLLM Desktop (`plugins/anythingllm_mcp_servers.json`):**
translatedContent: **Exemple pour AnythingLLM Desktop (`plugins/anythingllm_mcp_servers.json`)¬†:**

originContent: ```json
translatedContent: ```json

originContent: "mcpServers": {
translatedContent: "mcpServers": {

originContent: "pubchem": {
translatedContent: "pubchem": {

originContent: "name": "PubChem Server (Enhanced)",
translatedContent: "name": "PubChem Server (Enhanced)",

originContent: "transport": "stdio",
translatedContent: "transport": "stdio",

originContent: "command": "\"C:\\path\\to\\your\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe\" \"C:\\path\\to\\your\\project\\pubchem_server.py\"",
translatedContent: "command": "\"C:\\path\\to\\your\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe\" \"C:\\path\\to\\your\\project\\pubchem_server.py\"",

originContent: "cwd": "C:\\path\\to\\your\\project"
translatedContent: "cwd": "C:\\path\\to\\your\\project"

originContent: ### 3.1 Implementation Examples with AnythingLLM
translatedContent: ### 3.1 Exemples d'impl√©mentation avec AnythingLLM

originContent: Here are some examples of how to interact with the agent. These tests were conducted using AnythingLLM Desktop, connecting to various Large Language Models via OpenRouter.
translatedContent: Voici quelques exemples de la fa√ßon d'interagir avec l'agent. Ces tests ont √©t√© r√©alis√©s en utilisant AnythingLLM Desktop, en se connectant √† divers grands mod√®les de langage via OpenRouter.

originContent: A crucial finding from our testing is the importance of the model you choose. We **strongly recommend against using small or local models** for this task. Smaller models often struggle to correctly parse the data returned by the tool, leading to errors such as hallucinated values, incorrect formatting, or, most critically, **rounding decimal numbers**, which defeats the purpose of this high-precision tool.
translatedContent: Une constatation cruciale de nos tests est l'importance du mod√®le que vous choisissez. Nous **d√©conseillons fortement l'utilisation de mod√®les petits ou locaux** pour cette t√¢che. Les mod√®les plus petits ont souvent du mal √† analyser correctement les donn√©es renvoy√©es par l'outil, entra√Ænant des erreurs telles que des valeurs hallucin√©es, un formatage incorrect ou, plus critique encore, **l'arrondi des nombres d√©cimaux**, ce qui va √† l'encontre de l'objectif de cet outil √† haute pr√©cision.

originContent: To ensure the integrity of your results, it's always a good practice to verify the raw data returned by the MCP. You can learn how to do this in the next section: [3.2 How to verify MCP outputs in the logs](#32-how-to-verify-mcp-outputs-in-the-logs).
translatedContent: Pour garantir l'int√©grit√© de vos r√©sultats, il est toujours conseill√© de v√©rifier les donn√©es brutes renvoy√©es par le MCP. Vous pouvez apprendre comment faire cela dans la section suivante : [3.2 Comment v√©rifier les sorties MCP dans les logs](#32-comment-v√©rifier-les-sorties-mcp-dans-les-logs).

originContent: On the other hand, several models have demonstrated excellent performance. We achieved outstanding results with  **Google's `Gemini 2.5 Flash lite`**. showed remarkable precision in handling long decimal numbers and correctly formatting the final Markdown table.
translatedContent: D'autre part, plusieurs mod√®les ont montr√© d'excellentes performances. Nous avons obtenu des r√©sultats remarquables avec **le `Gemini 2.5 Flash lite` de Google**, qui a d√©montr√© une pr√©cision remarquable dans la gestion des nombres d√©cimaux longs et un formatage correct du tableau Markdown final.

originContent: Google gemini 2.5 flash lite without prompt and with prompt keep perfect decimals (in the example use 0.6 of temperature)
translatedContent: Google Gemini 2.5 Flash lite sans prompt et avec prompt conserve parfaitement les d√©cimales (dans l'exemple, utiliser une temp√©rature de 0,6)

originContent: For this specific task, my personal favorite is **`Gemini 2.5 Flash lite`** due to its consistent accuracy and reliability.
translatedContent: Pour cette t√¢che sp√©cifique, mon favori personnel est **`Gemini 2.5 Flash lite`** en raison de sa pr√©cision et fiabilit√© constantes.

originContent: ### 3.2 How to Verify MCP Outputs in the Logs
translatedContent: ### 3.2 Comment v√©rifier les sorties MCP dans les logs

originContent: The best way to confirm that the agent is receiving the correct data and that the LLM is not making mistakes is to check the debug log file generated by the MCP server.
translatedContent: La meilleure fa√ßon de confirmer que l'agent re√ßoit les bonnes donn√©es et que le LLM ne fait pas d'erreurs est de v√©rifier le fichier de log de d√©bogage g√©n√©r√© par le serveur MCP.

originContent: This server is configured to automatically create a log file in a subfolder within your project directory. The location will be:
translatedContent: Ce serveur est configur√© pour cr√©er automatiquement un fichier de log dans un sous-dossier de votre r√©pertoire de projet. L'emplacement sera :

originContent: your-project-folder/
translatedContent: your-project-folder/

originContent: ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ logs_mcp/
translatedContent: ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ logs_mcp/

originContent: ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ mcp_debug.log
translatedContent: ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ mcp_debug.log

originContent: Inside `mcp_debug.log`, you will find the exact JSON data that the tool sends back to the LLM *before* the model processes it. You can manually inspect this JSON to verify any values, especially long decimal numbers from properties like `monoisotopic_mass`, ensuring that the LLM has not introduced any rounding errors or hallucinations in its final answer.
translatedContent: √Ä l'int√©rieur de `mcp_debug.log`, vous trouverez les donn√©es JSON exactes que l'outil renvoie au LLM *avant* que le mod√®le ne les traite. Vous pouvez inspecter manuellement ce JSON pour v√©rifier toutes les valeurs, en particulier les nombres d√©cimaux longs issus de propri√©t√©s telles que `monoisotopic_mass`, afin de vous assurer que le LLM n'a introduit aucune erreur d'arrondi ou hallucination dans sa r√©ponse finale.

originContent: ## üìä Usage
translatedContent: ## üìä Utilisation

originContent: Once integrated, your AI assistant will automatically use this tool when asked about chemical information. The primary tool exposed is `search_compounds_by_name`.
translatedContent: Une fois int√©gr√©, votre assistant IA utilisera automatiquement cet outil lorsqu'on lui demandera des informations chimiques. L'outil principal expos√© est `search_compounds_by_name`.

originContent: ### Example Prompt
translatedContent: ### Exemple de prompt

originContent: This prompt demonstrates the tool's ability to handle a list of compounds with varying name types and retrieve multiple properties.
translatedContent: Ce prompt d√©montre la capacit√© de l'outil √† g√©rer une liste de compos√©s avec diff√©rents types de noms et √† r√©cup√©rer plusieurs propri√©t√©s.

originContent: @agent
translatedContent: @agent

originContent: Please use your PubChem tool to find information on the following compounds:
translatedContent: Please use your PubChem tool to find information on the following compounds:

originContent: - Thiamine (Vitamin B1)
translatedContent: - Thiamine (Vitamin B1)

originContent: - Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)
translatedContent: - Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)

originContent: - Folic Acid
translatedContent: - Folic Acid

originContent: - Hydroxocobalamin
translatedContent: - Hydroxocobalamin

originContent: For each compound found, please retrieve the IUPAC Name, Molecular Formula, and Monoisotopic Mass.
translatedContent: For each compound found, please retrieve the IUPAC Name, Molecular Formula, and Monoisotopic Mass.

originContent: Present all the results in a single Markdown table.
translatedContent: Present all the results in a single Markdown table.

originContent: The agent will call the `search_compounds_by_name` tool, which will intelligently find each compound, retrieve its data, and return it to the LLM for formatting.
translatedContent: L'agent appellera l'outil `search_compounds_by_name`, qui trouvera intelligemment chaque compos√©, r√©cup√©rera ses donn√©es et les renverra au LLM pour mise en forme.

originContent: ## üõ† MCP Tool Exposed
translatedContent: ## üõ† Outil MCP Expos√©

originContent: ### `search_compounds_by_name`
translatedContent: ### `search_compounds_by_name`

originContent: Searches for multiple compounds by name, one by one, using a smart fallback strategy with pauses and retries for maximum reliability.
translatedContent: Recherche plusieurs compos√©s par nom, un par un, en utilisant une strat√©gie de repli intelligente avec pauses et tentatives pour une fiabilit√© maximale.

originContent: **Parameters:**
translatedContent: **Param√®tres :**

originContent: -   `names` (List[str]): A list of compound names. Example: `["Aspirin", "Ibuprofen"]`
translatedContent: -   `names` (List[str]) : Une liste de noms de compos√©s. Exemple : `["Aspirine", "Ibuprof√®ne"]`

originContent: **Returns:** A list of dictionaries, where each dictionary contains either the found compound's information or an error message detailing why the search failed for that specific compound.
translatedContent: **Retourne :** Une liste de dictionnaires, o√π chaque dictionnaire contient soit les informations du compos√© trouv√©, soit un message d'erreur expliquant pourquoi la recherche a √©chou√© pour ce compos√© sp√©cifique.

originContent: ## üôè Acknowledgements
translatedContent: ## üôè Remerciements

originContent: This project was heavily inspired by and built upon the foundation of the original [PubChem-MCP-Server](https://github.com/JackKuo666/PubChem-MCP-Server) created by **JackKuo666**.
translatedContent: Ce projet a √©t√© fortement inspir√© par et construit sur la base de l'original [PubChem-MCP-Server](https://github.com/JackKuo666/PubChem-MCP-Server) cr√©√© par **JackKuo666**.

originContent: While this repository is not a direct fork, the original project was the crucial starting point. This version enhances the original concept with a focus on extreme robustness, intelligent search strategies, and user privacy through optional Tor integration üßÖ.
translatedContent: Bien que ce d√©p√¥t ne soit pas un fork direct, le projet original a √©t√© le point de d√©part crucial. Cette version am√©liore le concept original en mettant l'accent sur une robustesse extr√™me, des strat√©gies de recherche intelligentes et la confidentialit√© des utilisateurs via une int√©gration optionnelle de Tor üßÖ.

originContent: Many thanks to the original author for their fantastic work and for sharing it with the community.
translatedContent: Un grand merci √† l'auteur original pour son travail fantastique et pour le partage avec la communaut√©.

originContent: ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer
translatedContent: ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Avertissement

originContent: This tool is intended for research and educational purposes. Please respect PubChem's terms of service and use this tool responsibly.
translatedContent: Cet outil est destin√© √† des fins de recherche et d'√©ducation. Veuillez respecter les conditions d'utilisation de PubChem et utiliser cet outil de mani√®re responsable.
